title: Edge AI-Driven Interactive Machine Learning Practical Application Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners must acquire efficient model personalization techniques in edge device environments with limited computing resources, emphasizing user-friendly model training via interactive feedback systems.

learning_goals: Designing a model improvement process utilizing a three-tier feedback system (class match/mismatch/noise) in edge AI environments.

Learners will implement a personalized learning workflow prototype combining (1) a noise filter recommendation module and (2) a sample recommendation system within a CPU 4-core/RAM 8GB environment within one week, and submit a performance validation report achieving response time ≤2 seconds (based on 90% of requests) and CPU utilization ≤70% (peak-based) in system performance evaluation.
Training and evaluating object recognition models applying interactive machine learning techniques.
Establishing incremental model update strategies through user feedback under limited interface conditions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
